huffman

Class Huffman

  • java.lang.Object
    • huffman.Huffman

  • public class Huffman
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods implementing (de)compression by Huffman coding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Huffman()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateFrequencies

        public static int[] calculateFrequencies(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> data)
        Calculate the frequencies of characters in the input.
        Parameters:
        data - A list of input characters. Each element must be between 0..255.
        Returns:
        An array where the element with index i is the frequency of the character i in data.

      • buildTree

        public static HuffmanTree buildTree(int[] freqs)
        Build a Huffman tree from the given frequencies.
        Parameters:
        freqs - The frequencies. Must be a size 256 array of (non-negative) integers.
        Returns:
        A corresponding Huffman tree.

      • findCode

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> findCode(HuffmanTreeNode node)
        Find the Huffman code of a given input character.
        Parameters:
        node - A leaf node representing the character.
        Returns:
        The code for the character.

      • compress

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> compress(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> data)
        Compress a list of bytes.
        Parameters:
        data - The input bytes. Must be a list of integers between 0..255.
        Returns:
        A list of bits containing the compressed data.

      • decompress

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> decompress(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> bits,
                                                int[] freqs)
        Decompress a list of bits.
        Parameters:
        bits - The input bits. Must be something produced by compress().
        freqs - The frequencies of the bytes in the original input.
        Returns:
        The decompressed data.

      • writeHeader

        public static void writeHeader(java.io.OutputStream outs,
               int[] freqs,
               int actualBitCount)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Write header information to a stream. The header consists of: - the four headerMagik bytes - the number of bits in the compressed data as a 4-byte integer - a table of 256 4-byte integers containing the frequency data
        Parameters:
        outs - The stream.
        freqs - The frequencies.
        actualBitCount - The bit count.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readHeader

        public static int readHeader(java.io.InputStream ins,
             int[] freqs)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Read header information from a stream.
        Parameters:
        ins - The stream.
        freqs - An array of 256 integers. The frequencies are written here and the original data is destroyed.
        Returns:
        The bit count.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        writeHeader()

      • writeBits

        public static void writeBits(java.io.OutputStream outs,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> bits)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Write a list of bits to a stream. If the number of bits is 8*q + r, where r is in (0,8), then the last 8-r bits written will be garbage.
        Parameters:
        outs -
        bits -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readBits

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> readBits(java.io.InputStream ins)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Read a list of bits from a stream. The number of bits read is always divisible by 8.
        Parameters:
        ins -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • compressStream

        public static void compressStream(java.io.InputStream ins,
                  java.io.OutputStream outs)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Compress a stream into another stream.
        Parameters:
        ins - Input stream.
        outs - Output stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public static void decompressStream(java.io.InputStream ins,
                    java.io.OutputStream outs)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Decompress a stream into another stream.
        Parameters:
        ins - Input stream.
        outs - Output stream.
